summary: MY 1999 4X4 AUTOMATIC WITH ABS AS I TURNED OFF THE IGNITION I HEARD A HUMMING SOUND COMING FROM THE ABS PUMP MOTOR, IT CONTINUED TO HUM UNTIL I REMOVED THE FUSE SO AS NOT TO RUN DOWN THE BATTERY. A BUDDY SAID GM KNOWS ABOUT THE PROBLEM AND WILL DO NOTHING. I NEED A NEW CONTROL MODULE THAT WILL COST BETWEEN $500 AND $900. THE TRUCK ONLY HAS 44000 ON IT. *JB
